content.question: Benthamâ€™s argument exemplifies which of the following processes at work in eighteenth-century Europe?

choices.label: The shift from subsistence to commercial agriculture
The expansion of cottage industry and the putting-out system
Increased government debt as a result of frequent wars
The loosening of traditional moral restrictions on economic activity

content.answer: The loosening of traditional moral restrictions on economic activity

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
